alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Franklin; Sebastian; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 5:28AM CDT until September 08 at 6:15AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Franklin County in west central Arkansas... Crawford County in northwestern Arkansas... Northeastern Sebastian County in west central Arkansas... South central Washington County in northwestern Arkansas... * Until 615 AM CDT. * At 528 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles southwest of Devils Den State Park to near Lee Creek to 2 miles north of Short, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Van Buren... Ozark... Charleston... Cedarville... Mountainburg... Natural Dam... Alma... Lavaca... Mulberry... Dyer... Chester... Rudy... Lee Creek... Bloomer... Devils Den State Park... Lake Fort Smith... Figure Five... Fern... Kibler... Concord... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 5 and 36. Interstate 540 between mile markers 1 and 2. Interstate 49 between mile markers 22 and 40. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
